Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/1985, off Bill Campbell (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1985, off Dave Dravecky (SD)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles to Texas on 3/4/1986 (Going to LAD: P Matt Williams, P Yorkis Perez, CF Oddibe McDowell. Going to TEX: 2B Greg Brock, 2B Tim Flannery)...
9/11/1986: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/6/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $380,000 per year...
7/27/1990: Signed a minor league contract extension with Toronto...
Released by Toronto on 10/16/1990...
